sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()" #apartmentForm="ngForm">
    <input type="text" name="name" ngModel required maxlength="99" placeholder="Apartment name">
    <input type="number" name="rooms" ngModel required min="1" placeholder="Number of rooms">
    <input type="number" name="price" ngModel required min="1" placeholder="Price">
    <textarea name="description" ngModel maxlength="999" placeholder="Description"></textarea>
    <button type="submit" [disabled]="apartmentForm.invalid">Add</button>
  </form>
